DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess distribution , metabolism , excretion radio-labelled AZD9742 administer 2-hour infusion healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Healthy Males Assess Distribution , Metabolism , Excretion Radio-labelled AZD9742 Administered 2-hour Infusion
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer age 55 year old Day 1 , body weight > 50 kg , body mass index ( BMI ) 18 kg/m2 30 kg/m2 Regular bowel movement , least per day ( self report ) Volunteers must willing intravenous ( IV ) blood sample either arm . Volunteers ensure partner childbearing potential use reliable method contraception , well use barrier method . History clinically significant disease abnormality , include history presence gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal disease condition know interfere metabolism , excretion drug Any clinically significant illness , medical/surgical procedure , trauma within 4 week first administration investigational product Current smoker smoke used nicotine product within previous 30 day History alcohol abuse excessive intake alcohol Participation 1 radiolabeled investigational study drug trial within 1 year prior checkin . The previous radiolabeled study drug receive 6 month prior checkin total exposure study previous study must within CFR recommend level consider safe ( per 21 CRF 362.1 , less 5,000 mrem whole body annual exposure ) .
DOC.keyword: amount radioactive AZD9742 urine , feces , vomitus ( appropriate )
